extracted_playbook.title: Implement a Recovery Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain and retain multiple copies of sensitive or proprietary data and servers in a physically separate, segmented, and secure location.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce NIST Password Standards
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to comply with NIST standards for developing and managing password policies.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Administrator Credentials for Software Installation
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that administrator credentials are required to install software.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Systems Updated
extracted_playbook.description: Keep all operating systems, software, and firmware up to date. Prioritize patching known exploited vulnerabilities in internet-facing systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Phishing-Resistant MFA
extracted_playbook.description: Require phishing-resistant multifactor authentication to administrator accounts and standard MFA for all services, particularly for webmail, VPNs, and accounts accessing critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Segment networks to prevent the spread of ransomware by controlling traffic flows and restricting adversary lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Monitoring Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Identify, detect, and investigate abnormal activity and potential ransomware traversal with a network monitoring tool.

extracted_playbook.title: Install and Update Antivirus Software
extracted_playbook.description: Install, regularly update, and enable real-time detection for antivirus software on all hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Secure Logging Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement secure logging collection and storage practices. Reference CISAâ€™s Logging Made Easy resources for best practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Review and Audit Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Review domain controllers, servers, workstations, and active directories for new and/or unrecognized accounts. Audit user accounts with administrative privileges and configure access controls according to the principle of least privilege.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Ports and Command-Line Activities
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused ports and command-line and scripting activities to prevent privilege escalation and lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Embed Security into Product Architecture
extracted_playbook.description: Embed security into product architecture throughout the entire software development lifecycle (SDLC).

extracted_playbook.title: Mandate MFA for Privileged Users
extracted_playbook.description: Mandate MFA, ideally phishing-resistant MFA, for privileged users and make MFA a default feature.
